file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 06-41-02-01 - CONFIG-1 - FLOOR PANELS - COMPONENT LOCATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL FLOOR PANELS - COMPONENT LOCATION EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-145 1. General A. This section gives the access doors and panels of major zones 100 and 200 of the fuselage outside. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General CONFIG-1 06-41-02 Page 1 of 16 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL FLOOR PANELS - COMPONENT LOCATION EFFECTIVITY: ACFT MODEL(S) EMB-145 2. List of the Equipment and Components A. Tables 101 thru 106 give the equipment and components to which you can get access through the floor panels. NOTE: To find the access panels that give access to the harness assemblies, refer to wiring manual, as follows: • Splices: (WM 20-13-01/2). • Connectors: (WM 20-13-02/2). • Relays: (WM 20-13-03/2). • Terminal boards: (WM 25-13-04/2). • Grounding studs: (WM 20-13-05/2). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 PGBLK 100 CONFIG-1 06-41-02 Page 2 of 16 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
